title: Failed to process email due to unauthorized email domain
content:
The user receives the following email notification after sending an email:

We could not process your email because the email address doesn't belong to an authorized email domain.

To create, track, or update a request, log in to the Service Portal.

Possible causes

The user's email domain isn't defined as a permitted domain.

Solution

Make sure to define the user's email domain (for example, example.com) in the endpoint:

  1. From the main menu, select Administration > Utilities > Integration > Endpoints > Configure > Advanced connection configuration > Authorized email domains.
  2. Enter the user's email domain and save the change.
  3. Restart the OPB service.
